BigTwo - Class in <Unnamed>
The BigTwo class implements the CardGame interface and is used to model a Big Two card game.
BigTwo() - Constructor for class BigTwo
A constructor for creating a Big Two card game.
BigTwoCard - Class in <Unnamed>
It is the subclass of Card class which is used to model a card used in Big Two card game.It inherits all the methods from the Card class and overrides compareTo() method so that it can reflect the ordering of cards used in a Big Two card game.
BigTwoCard(int, int) - Constructor for class BigTwoCard
A constructor for building a card with the specified suit and rank.
BigTwoClient - Class in <Unnamed>
The BigTwoClient class implements the NetworkGame interface.
BigTwoClient(BigTwo, BigTwoGUI) - Constructor for class BigTwoClient
A constructor for creating a Big Two client.
BigTwoDeck - Class in <Unnamed>
It is the subclass of Deck class which is used to model the deck of cards.
BigTwoDeck() - Constructor for class BigTwoDeck
 
BigTwoGUI - Class in <Unnamed>
This is BigTwoGUI class which builds a GUI for the game and handles all the user actions.
BigTwoGUI(BigTwo) - Constructor for class BigTwoGUI
A constructor for creating a BigTwoGUI.
BigTwoServer - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used to model a Big Two card game server.
BigTwoServer() - Constructor for class BigTwoServer
Creates and returns an instance of the BigTwoServer class.
